segments.text: What ’ s the matter , Sally ? You look so unhappy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I had a bad day yesterday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I went to the library and lost my bag .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your bag ? Did you get it back ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I went back for it . But it was already gone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s too bad . I ’ m sorry to hear that .
segments.speaker: S1
